summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account for the month of November 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and fees, as well as instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.

persons.name: Jj Litchford
persons.context: Jj Litchford is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $129,086.45 on November 1, 2015.
The ending balance as of November 30, 2015, was $576,832.86.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made throughout November, including payroll fees and health premiums.
The document outlines procedures for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
There were no overdraft fees reported for the statement period.
